name: chicken couscous
ingredients: 1 whole chicken or chicken thighs with hips
Spices: 1 tsp paprika, 2 tsp cumin or Ras el Hanout, 1 tbsp ground ginger, 2 tsp turmeric, salt and pepper
steps: In the bottom pot of the couscoussier, brown the chicken in olive oil. Remove the chicken and set aside.
Saut√© the chopped onion. Add the chicken, cumin, ginger, paprika, celery, turmeric, and 2 liters of water. Cook for about 20 minutes.
Add the hard vegetables (carrots, turnip) and the tomato paste. Continue cooking.
Steam the couscous semolina (in the top of the couscoussier, in 3 batches, with sprinkling and fluffing between each cooking). Add smen (fermented butter) at the end of the semolina cooking.
Add the zucchinis, squash, cabbage, and chickpeas to the broth. Finish cooking the vegetables.
Arrange the couscous in a dome shape. Place the chicken and vegetables on top. Drizzle with broth (also served on the side). Garnish with cilantro.
